Notifications should only be sent for questions on assignment and when comments have been added
  • Open Administration>Notifications>Events and Targets
  • Create a new project configuration
  • Remove all events except of
    • workitem-commented
    • workitem-assigned
    • workitem-watcher-added
    • workitem-watcher-removed
    • document-updated
    • document-commented
  • Open Advanced Settings and add a filter so E-Mails will only be sent if a "Question" is assigned or commented.Â
